name: Asylum - Meshugana - Toro
additionalNotes: During this year’s Rocky Mountain Cigar Festival, Asylum Cigars will be releasing a new limited edition cigar called Meshugana that was developed in collaboration with Cigar Dojo. The cigar is a 6 x 52 toro and a Honduran puro highlighted by a corojo wrapper and Jamastran-grown tobaccos in the binder and filler. It is being produced by The CLE Factory in Honduras.
